name: Laval Archer
text: If this card is Normal Summoned: During your Main Phase this turn, you can Normal Summon 1 "Laval" monster, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set (you can only gain this effect once per turn). If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 FIRE monster you control; destroy it, and if you do, Special Summon this card in Defense Position, but banish it when it leaves the field, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except FIRE monsters. You can only use this effect of "Laval Archer" once per turn.
